segments.text: Oh no, look at that sink just gushing water all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's completely oblivious, polishing that dish like her life depends on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's soaking her shoes and the floor, it could get so slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she slips, it might be really bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, those kids over there are up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that shaky stool, stretching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll come crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just egging him on, reaching up too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking cookies behind the mom's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon before something happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting wet, that can't be good for the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything inside is chaos, but outside the window it's all calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR
